title: Implement New Login Feature
description: Develop and implement a new login system with OAuth integration
acceptanceCriteria: Users should be able to log in using their Google or Facebook accounts

title: Create Dashboard UI
description: Design and build a user-friendly dashboard for data visualization
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard should display real-time analytics with customizable widgets

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Identify and optimize slow-performing database queries for improved performance
acceptanceCriteria: Database queries should execute within milliseconds under expected load

title: Implement Payment Gateway
description: Integrate a secure payment gateway for processing online transactions
acceptanceCriteria: Payment gateway should support major credit cards and PayPal

title: Enhance User Feedback Mechanism
description: Improve the user feedback mechanism to gather actionable insights
acceptanceCriteria: Users should be able to provide feedback easily and receive prompt responses
